page.title: 07Recreation. Health.
page.content:
There are five pubs in the area which attract people from some distance offering meals at lunch time as well as the evening. The skittle alley in the Wool Pack at Beckington is used on numerous occasions by various groups in the area. Live music is also available at the Forresters Arms in Beckington.
{Health
There are four doctors, a trainee and three health visitors at Beckington Surgery. Prescriptions can be made up at The Surgery as there is no chemist in the village. One of the doctors does the school medicals. A clinic is held every week at the Village Hall for mothers and babies.
